message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. This is a great deal, considering its true value to me is at least $12000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $12000? I believe this would be a fair compromise.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13500. This is still a great deal, considering its true value to me is at least $12000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort, but I'm still looking to keep my spending within my budget. Could we possibly agree on $12750? This would allow me to purchase the product without exceeding my financial limits.

Hi Bob, I understand your financial constraints, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $12750. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer it to you for $13250. This is the lowest I can go, considering its true value to me is at least $12000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget. After careful consideration, I believe I can reach an agreement at $13000. This price respects both our positions and allows me to purchase the product without going over my financial limits.
